Text.Language: Ak[ici a~l/ywc: w~ pinis] m~marturoc: peniwt pimakarioc: a~pa Kactwr pip~recbuteroc.
You were truly exalted,Â / O great martyr,Â / our blessed father,Â / Abba Kastur the Presbyter.

We all praiseÂ / our Lord Jesus ChristÂ / and honor the martyr,Â / Abba Kastur the Presbyter.
